LanguageData.VAERoy_Quail.label: quail
LanguageData.VAERoy_Quail.description: Royal poultry bred specifically for human consumption, quail meat is one of a kind, with a taste so succulent it turns any meal into a lavish meal.\n\n<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color> Their extremely tasty meat instantly turns any simple or fine meal it’s used in into a lavish meal. It will also turn grills and bakes from Vanilla Cooking expanded into their lavish variations.
LanguageData.VAERoy_Quail.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.VAERoy_Quail.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.VAERoy_Quail.tools.2.label: head
